title: Global Occult Coalition Distinctive Unit Insignia
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:goc]]

[[module CSS]]
.art-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-content: center;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-self: flex-end
    gap: 1rem 1rem;
}
.art-container .art {
    flex: 0 1 150px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art .image-container {
    padding: 0;
    min-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Distinctive Unit Insignia created for the [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goc-hub-page| Global Occult Coalition's]]] PHYSICS Division.

++ Commentary

Making these was fun - I'm a fan of heraldry and the contemporary designs of the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distinctive_unit_insignia US Military Distinctive Unit Insignia] were a big inspiration for this. The specific Strike Teams and Assessment Teams depicted were mostly chosen for their names and the designs I could come up with based on them, I remain open to suggestions for further work. I could add more commentary, but I think part of the fun of heraldry is working out the references yourself.

Feel free to download the [https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/735-Sparkplug.svg Sparkplug] and [https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art:goc-unit-insignia/1102-Broken-Dagger.svg Broken Dagger] .svg files and then use them to make your own - the font I used is Russo One, and most of the images are sourced from [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Main_Page Wikimedia Commons], although there is also a great heraldry resource [http://www.vikinganswerlady.com/Stars/Heraldry_SVG_Images/index.htm here].
